full_text: Tweets from Ukraine’s defence ministry tell citizens which parts of a tank are most vulnerable to Molotov cocktails. Ordinary people risk their lives by standing in front of armoured vehicles https://t.co/VRjSdsePeg

localize.full_text: ウクライナ国防省のツイートで、戦車のどの部分が火炎瓶の被害を受けやすいかを市民に伝えている。一般市民が装甲車の前に立ち、命を危険にさらす https://t.co/VRjSdsePeg
